item.title: 债券市场已准备好 4000 亿欧元支票供德国使用
item.description:
经过多年的自律，要求德国放松财政束缚的呼声日益高涨。【原文：

After years of self-discipline, calls are growing for Germany to loosen the purse strings. 

】

item.title: 莫迪领导的政党在重要邦的民意调查中获胜，印度股市延续涨势
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪领导的印度人民党联盟周一在印度最富裕的马哈拉施特拉邦大获全胜，印度股票基准指数随之飙升。【原文：Stock benchmarks in India surged on Monday as Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s Bharatiya Janata Party-led alliance secured a thumping victory in the nation’s wealthiest state of Maharashtra.】

item.title: Edelweiss 聘请 Nomura 出售共同基金单位股权
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Edelweiss Financial Services Ltd. 已聘请野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.【原文：Edelweiss Financial Services Ltd. has hired Nomura Holdings Inc. to help find a buyer for a minority stake in its mutual fund business, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印尼 DIY 先生企业计划首次公开募股，筹资高达 2.97 亿美元
item.description: Mr DIY Group (M) Bhd 的印尼姊妹公司将在雅加达首次公开发行股票，寻求筹集多达 4.7 万亿印尼盾（2.97 亿美元）的资金，这将是印尼一年多来最大规模的上市活动。【原文：The Indonesian sister company of Mr DIY Group (M) Bhd. will list shares in Jakarta through an initial public offering that seeks to raise as much as 4.7 trillion rupiah ($297 million), in what would be the nation’s biggest listing in more than a year.】

item.title: 高盛认为美国关税风险将放缓亚洲降息步伐
item.description: 据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Asia’s central banks will proceed cautiously with further policy easing given strength in the greenback and the risk of Trump administration tariffs, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 特朗普选择财政部长后美元下跌，基本金属攀升
item.description: 在美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普对财政部长人选进行衡量后，美元下跌，基本金属和铁矿石因此上涨。【原文：Base metals and iron ore gained as the dollar dropped following US President-elect Donald Trump’s measured pick for Treasury secretary.】

item.title: 大日本印刷称埃利奥特已出售大部分股份
item.description: 大日本印刷株式会社（Dai Nippon Printing Co.这一消息导致该公司股价下跌。【原文：Dai Nippon Printing Co. said that Elliott Investment Management looks to have substantially reduced its position in the company, less than two years after the activist fund bought a stake. The news sent its share price down.】

item.title: S&P公司称，中国长达数十年的乳业繁荣期即将结束
item.description: 据S&P全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings）称，中国乳业长达数十年的繁荣期即将结束。【原文：The decades-long boom in China’s dairy industry is drawing to a close, according to S&P Global Ratings.】

item.title: Oneok 将以 43 亿美元股票收购 EnLink 中游公司的其余部分
item.description: 美国管道运营商 Oneok 公司发表声明称，将以 43 亿美元的价格收购其未持有的 EnLink Midstream LLC 普通股。【原文：US pipeline operator Oneok Inc. will acquire the common units of EnLink Midstream LLC it doesn’t own for $4.3 billion, according to a statement.】

item.title: 苹果公司首席执行官重返中国，中国政府准备犒赏首席执行官
item.description: 苹果公司（Apple Inc.首席执行官蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）今年至少是第三次访华，就在北京一位高级官员与一群外国首席执行官召开重要会议的同一天，他出现在一个供应商会议上。【原文：Apple Inc. Chief Executive Officer Tim Cook is visiting China for at least the third time this year, showing up at a suppliers’ conference on the same day a top Beijing official convened an important meeting with a group of foreign CEOs.】

item.title: 索尼正在为 PS5 游戏开发掌上游戏机，以与 Switch 竞争
item.description: 索尼集团公司正处于开发便携式游戏机的早期阶段，这种游戏机可以在移动中播放 PlayStation 5 游戏。【原文：Sony Group Corp. is in the early stages of developing a portable console that would play its PlayStation 5 games on the move.】

item.title: 莫迪领导的印度人民党在马哈拉施特拉邦大选中大获全胜，印度投资者关注政策推动情况
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 阿达尼在被美国指控后吹嘘现金充足
item.description: 印度阿达尼集团（Adani Group）表示，公司有足够的现金流偿还债务，在美国对公司创始人高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）的贿赂调查引发该企业集团股票和债券大跌后，公司试图向债权人作出保证。【原文：India’s Adani Group said it has enough cash flows to service debt obligations, as it sought to reassure creditors after a US bribery probe against founder Gautam Adani triggered a selloff in the conglomerate’s stocks and bonds.】

item.title: 据基尼报道，斯沃琪赢得马来西亚有关扣押傲慢手表的诉讼
item.description: 据马来西亚媒体 Malaysiakini 报道，瑞士钟表制造商斯沃琪集团（Swatch Group AG）在对马来西亚政府的诉讼中胜诉。【原文：Swiss watchmaker Swatch Group AG has won its lawsuit against the Malaysian government over last year’s controversial seizure of its Pride-themed watches in the Southeast Asian nation, according to a Malaysiakini report.】

item.title: 万达在流动性紧张的情况下寻求延长 4 亿美元债券的期限
item.description: 大连万达商业管理集团股份有限公司（Dalian Wanda Commercial Management Group Co., Ltd.）的一个部门正在为其 2025 年到期的美元债券提出延长期限的新条款，这反映出该中国公司在中国房地产低迷时期面临的流动性挑战。【原文：A unit of Dalian Wanda Commercial Management Group Co. is proposing new terms for its dollar bonds due 2025 to extend the maturity, reflecting the Chinese company’s liquidity challenges amid the country’s property downturn.】

item.title: 中国连续第二个月维持政策性贷款利率不变
item.description: 中国央行在上一次于 9 月份下调政策性贷款利率后保持利率不变，因为当局在加大货币刺激力度方面保持了耐心。【原文：China’s central bank kept a policy loan rate unchanged after last cutting it in September, as the authorities stay patient in ramping up monetary stimulus.】

item.title: 日本铁路股票因京成电机积极入股消息而飙升
item.description: 周一上午，日本火车运营商京成电气铁道株式会社（Keisei Electric Railway Co.【原文：Shares in Japanese train operators Keisei Electric Railway Co. and Keikyu Corp. jumped Monday morning following reports that a fund linked to activist investor Yoshiaki Murakami has built stakes in both companies.】

item.title: Folha 报称巴西肉类包装商暂停向家乐福供货
item.description: 据《圣保罗页报》（Folha de S. Paulo）报道，巴西的肉类包装商正在暂停向家乐福出售肉类，以报复家乐福决定停止向其母国法国的客户提供南方共同市场国家生产的肉类。【原文：Meatpackers in Brazil are suspending sales to Carrefour in retaliation to the company’s decision to stop offering meat produced in Mercosur nations to customers in its home country of France, Folha de S. Paulo reported.】

item.title: 乌克兰战争升级导致黄金上周大涨后保持稳定
item.description: 由于俄乌战争升级提振了避险需求，黄金在上周创下 20 个月来最大涨幅后趋于稳定。【原文：Gold steadied after jumping the most in 20 months last week as an escalation in the Russia-Ukraine war boosted haven demand.】

item.title: 印尼证券交易所考虑提高首次公开募股的上市标准
item.description: 印尼证券交易所正在考虑要求首次公开发行股票的最低募集资金，作为改革上市规则工作的一部分。【原文：The Indonesia Stock Exchange is considering requiring minimum proceeds for initial public offerings as part of efforts to revamp listing rules.】

item.title: 地缘政治风险上升，原油周线大涨后趋于平稳
item.description: 由于乌克兰和中东地区的地缘政治风险令投资者惶恐不安，石油价格在创下近两个月来最大单周涨幅后趋于稳定。【原文：Oil steadied after the biggest weekly gain in almost two months as geopolitical risks in Ukraine and the Middle East kept investors on edge.】

item.title: 下一波音乐产业整合浪潮即将到来
item.description:
音乐产业正在进入一个新时代，这一新时代的驱动因素包括大型唱片公司的增长放缓、独立音乐公司市场的不断扩大以及私募股权投资的迅猛发展。【原文：

The music industry is entering new era, one driven by a slowdown at the major labels, the growing market for independents and the rapacity of private equity.  

】

item.title: 外籍人士减少、中国人涌入重塑香港租赁市场
item.description: 由于人口结构的变化，香港的租赁市场正处于两极对立的状态。【原文：Hong Kong’s rental market is at polar opposites due to a shift in demographics.】

item.title: 美元的年末强势将让位于不明朗的 2025 年
item.description: 根据彭博市场实时脉搏的最新调查，美元将在 2025 年初站稳脚跟，然后在未来一年面临通胀加快和财政赤字激增等风险。【原文：The dollar is set to start 2025 on solid footing before facing risks such as faster inflation and a surging fiscal deficit over the coming year, according to the latest Bloomberg Markets Live Pulse survey.】

item.title: 菲律宾顶级公司关注掉期市场以管理债务风险
item.description: 菲律宾的顶级企业正在寻求利用新的比索利率互换机制来管理其债务支付，此举可能会推动菲律宾深化其资本市场。【原文：Top Philippine firms are looking to manage their debt payments by using the new peso interest-rate swap facility, a move that may bolster the nation’s push to deepen its capital market.】

item.title: 力拓解除澳大利亚氧化铝出口不可抗力限制
item.description: 据 S&P Global 报道，力拓集团取消了对其澳大利亚格拉德斯通炼油厂氧化铝出口的限制。【原文：Rio Tinto Group lifted restrictions on exports of alumina from its Gladstone refineries in Australia, according to S&P Global.】

item.title: 新西兰零售支出再次放缓，指向经济衰退
item.description: 由于高利率挫伤了消费者的情绪，新西兰零售支出连续第二个季度下降，这使得年中经济陷入衰退的迹象更加明显。【原文：New Zealand retail spending fell for a second straight quarter as high interest rates dented consumer sentiment, adding to signs the economy was in recession in the middle of the year.】

item.title: 美元下跌，财政部人选打消特朗普的赌注：市场综述
item.description: 美元下跌，比特币涨势停滞，因为交易商认为唐纳德-特朗普挑选斯科特-贝森特担任财政部长是一个有分寸的选择，缓和了当选总统获胜所引发的一些更狂热的押注。【原文：The dollar fell and Bitcoin’s rally stalled as traders viewed Donald Trump’s pick of Scott Bessent for Treasury Secretary as a measured choice, tempering some of the more fevered bets spurred by the president-elect’s victory.】

item.title: 比特币在接近 100,000 美元历史高位后涨势停滞
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普对加密货币的支持引发了投资者的乐观情绪，在比特币反弹至100,000美元的历史高位后，比特币出现了回落。【原文：Bitcoin retreated after a rally toward $100,000 sputtered just shy of the historic level amid warnings that investor optimism stemming from President-elect Donald Trump’s support for crypto was getting overdone.】

item.title: 亚马逊的 "登月计划 "将在人工智能芯片领域与英伟达一较高下
item.description:
这家云计算巨头不会在短期内赶走现有供应商，但希望减少对芯片制造商的依赖。【原文：

The cloud computing giant won’t dislodge the incumbent anytime soon but is hoping to reduce its reliance on the chipmaker.

】
